import React, {createRef, useState} from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const SingleProduct = (props) =>{ const InputRef = createRef() const [Styles, setStyles] = useState({indicators:["","","active"], inner:["carousel-item ","carousel-item ","carousel-item active"]}) const txt1 = [] const txt2 = [] const ImageView = (index) =>{ console.log(index) } const Repeater = () =>{ props.imagenes.forEach((e, i)=>{ txt1.push(
  • {ImageView(i)}}>
    • ) txt2.push(
    ) }) } Repeater() console.log(txt1,txt2) const Change = (direction) =>{ if(direction==="UP"){ InputRef.current.value++ }else if(direction==="DOWN"){ if(parseInt(InputRef.current.value) !== 1 ){ InputRef.current.value-- } } } return(
      {txt1}
    {txt2}

    {props.name}

    {props.price}

    • Category : {props.tag}
    • Availibility : {props.availibility}

    Mill Oil is an innovative oil filled radiator with the most modern technology. If you are looking for something that can make your interior look awesome, and at the same time give you the pleasant warm feeling during the winter.

    Añadir Link la carta
    ) } export default SingleProduct
